question: 1. If there are 10 edges in a graph, in the worst case how many edges can be traversed?
2. Which one of the following is correct?

answers.a: DFS uses queue & BFS can be done using stack & recursion.
answers.b: In DFS, all the neighbors are traversed before other nodes.
answers.c: DFS is a vertex-based algorithm while BFS is an edge-based algorithm.
answers.d: BFS is an optimal algorithm while DFS is not optimal.
